text: Cherbourg-Octeville is a city in France. It is in the region of Normandy, and in the Département of Manche. 43,000 people live inside the city and 117,000 near or in the city. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Cherbourg-en-Cotentin.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2015 ==Sister cities== Cherbourg is twinned with: * Poole, England * Bremerhaven, Germany * Deva, Romania == References == Category:Former communes in Manche Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Cherbourg-Octeville
